Title: Unsafe parsing of unclosed comments
Description: Parsing an unclosed comment can result in `Conditional jump or move depends on uninitialised value(s)` and unsafe memory access.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.6.6.4, all versions starting from 1.6.7.rc1 before 1.6.7.rc4
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.6.6.4 before 1.6.7.rc1, all versions starting from 1.6.7.rc4
